entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
